survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Sustainability Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on sustainability initiatives in the workplace to understand satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current sustainability initiatives in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
